sentences.sentence: We need your help—please give generously.
sentences.translation: 我们需要您的帮助，请慷慨解囊吧。

sentences.sentence: It was the people with the least money who gave most generously.
sentences.translation: 最没钱的人最慷慨大方。

sentences.sentence: He was desperate when he lost all his money. Luckily, a kind man helped him generously.
sentences.translation: 他把所有的钱都丢了，陷入了绝望的境地。幸好一个好心人慷慨地帮助了他。
